website_summaries.verdict: Easy to move around the room, as it doesn't weigh much with fabric drawers. Carries a low price.
pros: Very inexpensive nursery dresser, but it has less storage than other units with only four drawers
Will work as a night stand and dresser combination, potentially saving you some floor space in your nursery
Uses a steel frame and wood top to help with sturdiness
cons: Very small, so it won't hold many clothes
Fabric drawers can't handle same weight as wood drawers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture. It was easy to assemble and it’s low to the ground. A great size for a child’s room.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M.

customer_reviews.title: The material on the bins are POORLY made and disintegrates into a fine powder.
customer_reviews.text: The cloth bins are HORRIBLE. Told Amazon to NOT SELL THIS PRODUCT because the cloth on the cardboard that forms the bins disintergrated into this fine powder which made my nasal and lungs so irritated and I got sick. It's a GOOD THING that I didn't have it near my lil grand baby. I bought it June 2018 but by 6-8 months, the material on handles n top sides of the bins started to just disintergrate into pieces and fine powder. It was crazy and terrible. Poorly made in that way. Once that material falls apart, there goes your bin. ONLY 3 pieces of strings for the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the closet of my nursery and enough storage for all his clothes. Super easy to assemble, I’m almost 9 months pregnant and it took me maybe like 10 minutes to put together myself. Will probably order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Tevi Backus

customer_reviews.title: Handle is off of one drawer.
customer_reviews.text: One handle on one drawer is off. I already had put it together before I discovered the handle. There isn’t an option to contact seller there is only an option to return. I don’t want to return it because I put it together and threw out the box. I just would like one new drawer. I bought three of these dressers two are perfect. The blue one is the one that is missing the handle.
customer_reviews.author: 3Ob1v7

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Sturdy but Smelly
customer_reviews.text: See update below ****I bought this for my infant grandson until he got a little older until I found a nice dresser. It is well made, however the chemical smell is awful. I'm sure if the drawers were aired out for awhile it would be fine? I don't have time because he came early and now I don't have anywhere to put his clothes :/ ***UPDATE*** I ended up attempting to air these drawers out for multiple days out in my sunroom. Wiped them down sprayed the fabric with febreeze , used baking soda inside the drawers and nothing helped. I ended up returning it and they were really great about the return which I appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I didnt expect this to be as cheap as it is. Just got it delivered and I can't even put it together because they've gotten the screws and dimensions of the top head of the drawer wrong. It's also quite wobbly. Returning, and finding something better.
customer_reviews.author: Shakeera

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made drawers and after a while the front fabric starts to wrinkle up
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: It was so good I bought another one
customer_reviews.text: I moved into my first apartment that did not have a lot of closet space and I had no room for a dresser. After looking for a simple storage solution I stumbled upon this storage tower. It was so easy to assemble it put my ikea furniture to shame. I bought one first and I loved how much I could pack into each bin, that a week later I decided to buy another, and I bought their skinny version for storage solution in my bathroom to go next to the sink. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good storage
customer_reviews.text: Going into this we know it is cloth, so it is not as sturdy as wood. This was easy to assemble and my 10 year old built it by herself. The 4 drawers offer good storage for books, etc. They are nice big drawers and the pink color is really pretty.
customer_reviews.author: B. temple

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with quality and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Drawers are very appealing and this whole set is sturdy. I was worried that the drawers wouldn't be large enough but they are plenty big to function for what I need. Great value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these drawers. Had some in my daughters room and had to get more for my sons room. They are super cute, sturdy and have lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: The James Family

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Roomy Shelves no complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this little shelf! Fits great in 3yr old room. Put her clothes in there and plan on ordering two more sets (blue maybe) for my 4yr old son! Easy to put together and very durable. Shelves are deep and adds nice accent to room. Definitely a happy customer! :D
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Alfred

customer_reviews.title: I guess I was just expecting more
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping, easy to put together, no complaints with the packaging- I just felt like it was cheap. I know it cost $55, and that's not exactly top tier nightstand quality, but it also isn't this. If the price was something like $39, I'd be content to give it 5 stars but for the price and what I received-it's 3 star quality in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: J. F

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly came in great condition, nothing wrong with it. The drawers are fabric, so being in a box you expect them to get a little dented but they were dented in the back so you can not even tell. The first step was annoying for me personally but I got it. Lol It’s honestly just what I needed and not huge or heavy and I love that.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than payed for!
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest thing I've ever set up in my life. Its adorable, affordable, and quite large actually! I was finally able to organize what I needed and ended up with more space! Will probably order more of these for my crafting room once I set it up! Totally in love.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super satisfied with this dresser! I was a little worried from the reviews. Multiple people commented they received their item with twisted or damaged metal, but mine was delivered just fine. Took me 5 mins to assemble. It's solid and I like the fact that the bottom of bins are made with a more durable material. I was expecting just card board, but it's not. Also, the dresser is taller then what I thought, so bonus there too.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Hobson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and perfect for nursery
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and perfect for nursery. Easy to put together, holds baby clothes perfectly. Wouldn't recommend for an adult or even an older child because the drawers are little but is great for baby/toddler. We will use later once baby grows out of this for toys. Top of the dresser is made out of durable material and we have a lamp on top.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: A tad shorter than I expected, but still perfect size for my one year old's clothes, with room to spare. The purple was the exact shade I wanted, though it differs from the picture just a little. Picture looked pinkish purple, but arrived a pretty lavender shade. Has a tiny smell to it, a bit peppery, but not very noticeable and has faded with use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble like ten mins. Large deep drawers that hold more than you expect. Love the color on top too nice and light. Fabric feels nice and good value
customer_reviews.author: ani oganesyan

customer_reviews.title: Good value, nice look.
customer_reviews.text: Everything arrived on time, and undamaged. I put it together by myself in less than 1/2 hour. The adjustable feet are great for getting it level, and it sits pretty solid. It looks nice in my 7 year old's room. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to assemble. Took less than 10 minutes. This is the perfect size and I ordered another in green and a larger one for my son’s closet. Perfect for what I need to organize
customer_reviews.author: sarah scheller

customer_reviews.title: Love mDesign
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought one. Set it up, then bought another. This is a good design company.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Nebel

customer_reviews.title: Small but holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Love this, really convenient and holds a good amount of clothing. I use it for my little office.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works as Infant storage dresser
customer_reviews.text: Using this vertical storage for our infants clothes. It works for what we need it for!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. The design and quality is really on point. Looks great in my nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Aria Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Its fits perfectly in my room which is not big, but it has alot of room to hold my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Cmontejano02

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and really sturdy! We liked it so much, we bought two matching night stands and the longer dresser version for our kids' rooms!
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to build! Took 20 minutes for the first one and then 15 minutes for the second one. I wish the drawers went back a little deeper, but that’s my fault for not measuring that aspect. It is a little wobbly, but due to where I placed it I couldn’t use the steadying screws. I recommend this product for anyone with minimal space.
customer_reviews.author: J.O. Nogra

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sent two same facing panels, I can’t even assemble it correctly. The whole thing is not funcional. It took me a while to start the assembly process so now I can’t even return it and get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy and fast assembly!
customer_reviews.text: Great product- very sturdy and VERY easy 5 minute assembly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: nolin feller

customer_reviews.title: It could come with missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: My drawer came and I thought everything was fine until I noticed it’s missing 1 foundation piece, that you put inside each drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Nai

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a closet. Holds a fair amount of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as sturdy as I had hoped..once clothes are put in the drawers it becomes difficult to close drawers...but very appealing color
customer_reviews.author: alfred gelinas

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, smelly, and made poorly with wrong alignments.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! I bought two, one has the write screws in the right place, but wobbles back and forth ALOT. The second one has the correct alignment but is missing a drawer. It has been a week and it still stinks!!! Definitely returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Riley B

customer_reviews.title: Winner dresser
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Love the size, color, and price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I like this putbi ordered a solid color design not one with white dots. Very upset about that. Now as far as everything else this storage unit is the best it’s very spacious and pretty and easy to mount onto the wall
customer_reviews.author: md96

customer_reviews.title: Great deal. Great dresser!
customer_reviews.text: We’re expecting a baby and we wanted something sturdy and not to big, and this dresser fit perfectly in our space. I was really surprised how sturdy and easy to assemble is this dresser. Just what we wanted. For the price this is a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for babies clothing.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product for our babies clothing. It fits nicely in our room and is pretty study.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for to hold my kitchen towels. Easy to put together, seems sturdy. The baskets are nice and deep. Looked everywhere in the stores, online and finally found this. This would also be perfect for a child’s room or a baby nursery. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Pchez31

customer_reviews.title: Good for school & kids
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Perhaps more appropriate in a child’s bedroom, but it’s enough to get me through college.

customer_reviews.title: baby clothes storage
customer_reviews.text: perfect- I used this for baby clothes, light weight and great amount of size for tiny clothing

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell.. it’s the bins, had anyone else had that issue
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome, but has a fowl smell to it. Like urin...

customer_reviews.title: Bad product not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Again another cheaply made item that once together lasts a few days and falls apart so very upset bought 4 of these and they all broke with in days of each other never ever ever again

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again but it is a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to store baby clothes and was actually surprised at how easy it was to put together. Definitely a lot more sturdy than it looks, assuming you put it together correctly. I would totally buy it again but it is a little pricey for what it is.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for great price
customer_reviews.text: Great little dresser for storage inside my daughter's closet! Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Good

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any room
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a nursery and it was perfect! It was easy to put together, price was affordable and it shipped fast.

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: It looks really cute and can hold a lot of clothing. It is a little wobbly but it gets the job done. I wouldn’t say that it’s worth the money we paid for it.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this item!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. I’m a 77 year old woman and found assembly a breeze. Everything I needed was included. I appreciated the quality as well.

customer_reviews.title: Dresser

customer_reviews.title: Dorm Room Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter to use as extra storage in her dorm room closet. It would also be perfect to use as a bedside table in her dorm. Sturdy and super easy to assemble. All the tools are included.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: I was highly surprised about getting a soft storage unit. However, it was very affordable and easy to put together and it’s cute.I’m definitely please

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than expected; makes you wonder the price. But overall good
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would provide measurements in the photos because it was a little shorter than I had expected and therefore made it a bit pricey for the quantity. Other than that, the durability is good, the colors are nice, and the assembly was no hastle whatsoever.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! My four year old did most of the tightening 😊. It looks just as pictured. Seems very sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look cheap at all and has lots of storage space! I'm in love with these dressers

customer_reviews.title: It’s great dresser
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for small room where you don’t have much space. My teenagers love it.

customer_reviews.title: Dont get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Honestly if I knew how small and cheaply made this thing was I probably wouldn't have bought it. it costs way to much for what it is

customer_reviews.title: Ok substitute

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product especially the wood top. Makes the dresser more stable. Easy to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: The installation is easy too. But those boxes had some smell when ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute design and goes very well with my other nursery furnitures . The installation is easy too. But those boxes had some smell when I just opened them and it took some days to get rid of those smell . Other than that it's all good .

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Diaper Storage
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for elderly storage. I bought this to store grandmothers diapers. Each drawer holds 29 overnight female diapers. It looks super coordinated in her nursing home room with her purple quilt and lamp. She gets compliments all the time.

customer_reviews.title: Lime green? Oh well

product_meta.title: mDesign Vertical Furniture Storage Tower - Sturdy Steel Frame, Wood Top, Easy Pull Fabric Bins - Organizer Unit for Nursery, Child/Kid's Bedroom - 4 Drawers - Multi-Colored Drawers/White Frame
product_meta.description: Color:Bright MultiCreate stylish storage with this 4 Drawer Vertical Furniture Storage Cabinet from mDesign. The organizer separates and stores all of your wardrobe and linen essentials, and make it easy to find and grab what you need right away. 4 removable drawers separate and organize clothing and accessories like hats, socks and shoes, scarves, blankets and more in one convenient place. They offer roomy space for storing out of season clothing, shoes, purses, scarves, bedding, linens, and more. The classic fabric adds stylish storage to any bedroom closet, laundry area or other storage space in your home, and a wood top provides a hard surface to place lamps, accessories, home decor and more.
feature_bullets: 4 DRAWER CHEST: Features 4 removable drawers; Use in or out of the closet and keep clutter under control by storing all of your clothing and accessories in one convenient place; Store and organize workout gear, leggings, yoga pants, sweaters, linens and more; The vertical design fits easily in many locations throughout the home; Use as a nightstand and keep your alarm clock, journal, glasses close at hand; Mix & match with other mDesign storage organizers for endless organizational possibilities

STYLISH SMART STORAGE: This furniture stand boasts a slim, light weight design to easily fit into smaller spaces while still providing plenty of storage space; Wood top provides a hard surface to place lamps, books, decor, and more; The generously sized removable drawers have an easy pull handle to make opening and closing simple; Plastic feet will not scratch flooring, and they are adjustable for uneven surfaces

FUNCTIONAL & VERSATILE: Create coordinated organization in any room of the house; Great for children, tweens and adults; Use anywhere you want to add a little style to your organizational needs; This easy-to-use chest of drawers can be used in multiple rooms throughout the home; Great for closets, bedrooms, nurseries, playrooms, entryways and more; Ideal for small spaces such as apartments, condos, and college dorm rooms

QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: Made of breathable non-woven synthetic fabric; Strong steel frame and durable MDF wood top; Plastic feet protect floors; Hardware is included for hassle-free installation; Easy Care - wipe clean with a damp cloth and allow to air dry
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED: Measures 12" x 17.75" x 37" high

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars343 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
